pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, February 12, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, February 12, 2016:

Toronto

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Dovercourt Boys and Girls Club with Minister Mihychuk, Julie Dzerowicz, MP for Davenport, and Peter Schiefke, Parliamentary Secretary to the Prime Minister (Youth).

Dovercourt Boys and Girls Club
180 Westmoreland Avenue
Toronto, ON

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and will hold a media availability.

Dovercourt Boys and Girls Club
180 Westmoreland Avenue
Toronto, ON

Toronto

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the #First100 Twitter Q&A.

Closed to media

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
